title: Venison with kale, red cabbge purée, celeriac, baby beetroots, potato galette and blackberry sauce
description: Venison’s wonderful flavour is matched with earthy veg and a rich blackberry and ruby port sauce. Equipment and preparation: you will need a vegetable spiralizer for this recipe.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 bunch baby beetroots, cooked, peeled and cut it in half
2 large potatoes, cut into spirals on a spiralizer
1 head kale, leaves removed and roughly chopped
